snippet.title: Red Alert: A Path Beyond - Delta Extended Trailer
snippet.description:
Red Alert: A Path Beyond is a free standalone total conversion of Command & Conquer Renegade which focuses on recreating the world of Red Alert in a team-based tactical shooter environment.

Destroy the enemy base using a variety of exotic military hardware; including fan favourites such as the almighty Mammoth Tank, the deadly Agent Tanya, the high-voltage Tesla Tank and the explosive Demolition Truck!

To play the game for free, head over to http://www.w3dhub.com and click the download link at the top of the page.

Also feel free to follow us on social media and on our forums!

== Official Forums ==
http://www.w3dhub.com/forum/

== Facebook == 
https://www.facebook.com/w3dhub

== Twitter ==
https://twitter.com/W3DHub

== ModDB ==
http://www.moddb.com/company/w3d-hub

== Steam ==
https://steamcommunity.com/groups/w3dhub

== YouTube ==
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPVori4l3Rq_AkWHEjTKdEQ

Disclaimer: All of the game footage in this video was taken from online multiplayer matches.

Red Alert: A Path Beyond is a non-profit fan-driven project. We develop this game in our spare time out of our enthusiasm for Command & Conquer.

"Command & Conquer" and "Red Alert" are intellectual properties of Electronic Arts Inc. All rights reserved.
